categoriesExplanation: The video is primarily classified as 'Meditation' due to its strong emphasis on guided meditation, as indicated by the title '10-Minute Guided Meditation: Self-Love,' the channel name 'SELF,' and the description detailing this as a session led by a meditation teacher focusing on self-love. The comments further support this as they reflect the emotional impact and personal introspection typical of meditation experiences.
